Verses: 1 sthreeyinidaththil Pirandha Manushan Vaazhnaal Kuruginavanum Sanjalam Niraindhavanumaayirukkiraan.
2 avan Poovaippolap Pooththu Aruppungiraan; Nizhalaippola Nilainirkaamal Odippogiraan.
3 aagilum Ippadippattavanmel Neer Ummudaiya Kangalaith Thirandhuvaiththu, Ummudaiya Nyaayaththukku Ennaik Kondupoveero?
4 asuththamaanadhilirundhu Suththamaanadhaip Pirappikkaththakkavan Undo? Oruvanumillai.
5 avanudaiya Naatkal Immaaththiram Endru Kurikkappattirukkaiyaal, Avanudaiya Maadhangalin Thogai Ummidaththil Irukkiradhu; Avan Kadandhupogakkoodaadha Ellaiyai Avanukku Erpaduththineer.
6 avan Oru Koolikkaaranaippol Than Naalin Velaiyaayitru Endru Rammiyappadumattum Avan Oindhirukkumpadi Umadhu Paarvaiyai Avanaivittu Vilakkum.
7 oru Maraththaikkuriththaavadhu Nambikkaiyundu; Adhu Vettippodappattaalum Thirumbath Thazhaikkum, Adhin Ilankilaigal Thulirkkum;
8 adhin Ver Tharaiyile Pazhaiyadhaagi, Adhin Adikkattai Mannile Seththaalum,
9 thanneerin Vaasanaiyinaal Adhu Thulirththu, Ilamarampolak Kilaividum.
10 manushanovendraal Seththapin Ozhindhupogiraan, Manupuththiran Jeeviththupponapin Avan Enge?
11 thanneer Eriyilirundhu Vadindhu, Vellam Vatri Suvarippogiradhupola,
12 manushan Paduthdhukkidakkiraan; Vaanangal Ozhindhupogumalavum Ezhundhirukkiradhum Illai, Niththirai Thelindhu Vizhikkiradhum Illai.
13 neer Ennaip Paadhaalaththil Oliththu, Umadhu Kobam Theerumattum Ennai Maraiththu, Ennaith Thirumba Ninaikkumpadikku Enakku Oru Kaalaththaik Kuriththaal Nalamaayirukkum.
14 manushan Seththapin Pizhaippaano? Enakku Maarudhal Eppodhu Varumendru Enakkuk Kurikkappatta Poraattaththin Naalellaam Naan Kaaththirukkiren.
15 ennaik Kooppidum, Appozhudhu Naan Umakku Uththaravu Solluven; Umadhu Kaigalin Kiriyaiyinmel Viruppam Vaippeeraaga.
16 ippozhudhu En Nadaigalai Ennugireer; En Paavaththinmelallavo Gavanamaayirukkireer.
17 en Meerudhal Oru Kattaagak Kattappattu Muththiraipodappattirukkiradhu, En Akkiramaththai Orumikka Serththeer.
18 malaimudhalaai Vizhundhu Karaindhupom, Kanmalai Than Idaththaivittup Perndhupom.
19 thanneer Karkalaik Kudaiyum; Jalappiravaagam Boomiyin Thoolil Mulaiththadhai Moodum; Appadiye Manushan Kondirukkum Nambikkaiyai Azhikkireer.
20 neer Endraikkum Avanai Belanaai Nerukkugiradhinaal Avan Poividugiraan; Avan Mugaroobaththai Maarappanni Avanai Anuppividugireer.
21 avan Pillaigal Ganamadaindhaalum Avan Unaraan; Avargal Sirumaippattaalum Avargalai Gavaniyaan.
22 avan Maamsam Avanilirukkumalavum Adharku Novirukkum; Avan Aaththumaa Avanukkullirukkumattum Adharku Dhukkamundu Endraan.
